# name

**Instance Property**

The name of the port.

## Declaration

```swift
var name: String? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default behavior is to not use a name unless set.

## Configuring the port

- **isConsole**: A Boolean value that indicates whether this port is a console.

items.description: A Boolean value that indicates whether this port is a console.
